timezoneParams.option: GMT+08:00 (Beijing, Hong Kong, Shanghai, Taipei, Taiwan)

device.deviceconfig:
<?xml version="1.0" encoding="UTF-8" ?> <gs_provision version="1"> <config version="1">
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Door System Settings - Basic Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## -->
<!-- ALMOUT 1 Feature (0:Alarm Output 1:Open Door) --> <!-- <P15450>1</P15450> --> <!-- ALMOUT 1 Status (0:Normal Close 1:Normal Open) --> <!-- <P15470>1</P15470> --> <!-- Control Options (0:Door 1 1:Door 2 2:Door 1 & Door 2 3:None) --> <!-- <P15467>2</P15467> --> <!-- Wiegand Control Options (0:Door 1 1:Door 2 2:Door 1 & Door 2 3:None) --> <!-- <P15468>2</P15468> --> <!-- Delay before Unlock Action(s) Door 1 (value: 0-20) --> <!-- <P14100>0</P14100> --> <!-- Delay before Unlock Action(s) Door 2 (value: 0-20) --> <!-- <P15465>0</P15465> --> <!-- Unlock Action Holding Time(s) Door 1 (value: 1-20) --> <!-- <P14101>5</P14101> --> <!-- Unlock Action Holding Time(s) Door 2 (value: 1-20) --> <!-- <P15466>5</P15466> -->
<!-- Min. Interval of Swiping Card(ms) (value: 0-2000) --> <!-- <P14829>300</P14829> --> <!-- Number of Snapshots when Door 1 Opened (value: Integer) --> <!-- <P15474>4</P15474> --> <!-- Number of Snapshots when Door 2 Opened (value: Integer) --> <!-- <P15475>4</P15475> --> <!-- Snapshot when Door Opened - via FTP (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P14103>4</P14103> --> <!-- Snapshot when Door Opened - via Email (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15471>4</P15471> --> <!-- Snapshot when Door Pressed - via FTP (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15420>4</P15420> --> <!-- Snapshot when Door Pressed - via Email (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15409>4</P15409> -->
<!-- Call Mode (0:Virtual Number 1:SIP Number) --> <P14856>1</P14856> --> <!-- Doorbell Mode (0:Call Doorbell Number 1:Control Doorbell Output 2:Both Of Above) --> <!-- <P14827>0</P14827> --> <!-- Door Bell Call Mode (0:Serial Hunting 1:Parallel Hunting) --> <!-- <P15434>0</P15434> -->
<!-- Number Called When Door Bell Pressed (Integer)--> {IF blf1} <P10462>%%Value%%</P10462> {ELSE} <P10462></P10462> {ENDIF}
<!-- Maximum Number of Dialed Digits (0 - 20)--> <!-- <P15419>0</P15419> --> <!-- No Key Input Timeout(s) (0 - 15)--> <!-- <P15436>4</P15436> --> <!-- Press Doorbell Schedule (0 - 10)--> <!-- <P15418>0</P15418> --> <!-- Remote PIN to Open the Door 1. (Digital and max length is 8 --> <!-- <P10457></P10457> --> <!-- Remote PIN to Open the Door 2. (Digital and max length is 8 --> <!-- <P15460></P15460> --> <!-- Local PIN Type (0: Private Card PIN 1: Unified PIN 2: Card + Private PIN) --> <!-- <P10464>1</P10464> --> <!-- Unified PIN Open Door Options (0:Door 1 1:Door 2 2:Door 1 & Door 2 3:None) --> <!-- <P15461>0</P15461> --> <!-- Local PIN to Open the Door (Digital and max length is 8) --> <!-- <P10463></P10463> -->
<!-- Enable DTMF Open Door (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P14858>0</P14858> --> <!-- Enable Guest PIN (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P14850>0</P14850> --> <!-- Guest PIN (Digital and max length is 8) --> <!-- <P14851></P14851> --> <!-- Guest PIN Open Door Options (0:Door 1 1:Door 2 2:Door 1 & Door 2 3:None) --> <!-- <P15462>0</P15462> --> <!-- Guest PIN Duration Start Time . Example: 20170228023156 => 2017-02-28 02:31:56 --> <!-- <P14852></P14852> --> <!-- Guest PIN Duration End Time . Example: 20170228023156 => 2017-02-28 02:31:56 --> <!-- <P14853></P14853> --> <!-- Disable Auto Answer (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P14580>0</P14580> --> <!-- Enable Doorbell Button to Hang Up Call. (0:Disable 1:Enable (default)) --> <!-- <P14582>1</P14582> --> <!-- Disable Keypad (except Doorbell Button). (0:Disable(default) 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15421>0</P15421> --> <!-- Enable On Hook After Remote Unlock. (0:Disable(default) 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15422>0</P15422> --> <!-- Enable HTTP API Remote Open Door. (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15424>0</P15424> --> <!-- Open Door IDCode Valid Time (s). (5 - 300) --> <!-- <P15428>30</P15428> -->
<!-- Card Issuing State Expire Time(m) (1-1440) --> <!-- <P15423>5</P15423> --> <!-- Enable Key Blue Light (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P14800>1</P14800> --> <!-- Enable Background Light (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P14801>1</P14801> --> <!-- Enable Blue Doorbell Light (0:Disable 1:enable) --> <!-- <P14562>0</P14562> --> <!-- Blue Doorbell Light Lighting Start TIME(string exmaple: 125900) --> <!-- <P14560>000000</P14560> --> <!-- Blue Doorbell Light Lighting End TIME(string exmaple: 145930) --> <!-- <P14561>000000</P14561> --> <!-- Enable Blue Keypad Light (0:Disable 1:enable) --> <!-- <P15500>0</P15500> --> <!-- Blue Keypad Light Lighting Start TIME(string exmaple: 125900) --> <!-- <P15501>000000</P15501> --> <!-- Blue Keypad Light Lighting End TIME(string exmaple: 145930) --> <!-- <P15502>000000</P15502> --> <!-- Central Mode (0:disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15301>0</P15301> --> <!-- Key Tone Type (0:Default 1:DTMF 2:Mute) --> <!-- <P14340>0</P14340> --> <!-- Wiegand Input Enable (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P14120>0</P14120> --> <!-- Wiegand Output (0:Disabled 1:Relay and Local Authentication 2:Relay and Bypass Local) --> <!-- <P14121>0</P14121> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Door System Settings - Keep Door Open ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Keep Door 1 Open (0: Disable 1:Immediate Open Door 2:Schedule Open Door) --> <!-- <P15429>0</P15429> --> <!-- Emergency PIN to Disable Keep Door 1 Open (Digital string. Max.Length=8) --> <!-- <P15435></P15435> --> <!-- Length(m) to Keep Door 1 Open (Integer value: 5 - 480) --> <!-- <P15430>5</P15430> --> <!-- Schedule Start Time(Digital string) --> <!-- <P15211>20180516000000</P15211> --> <!-- Schedule End Time (Digital string) --> <!-- <P15212>20180516000000</P15212> --> <!-- Schedule Table (Format:door_sch,0@start_time@end_time. Example:door_sch,0@0000@2359) --> <!-- <P15213>0</P15213> -->
<!-- Keep Door 2 Open (0: Disable 1:Immediate Open Door 2:Schedule Open Door) --> <!-- <P15455>0</P15455> --> <!-- Emergency PIN to Disable Keep Door 2 Open (Digital string. Max.Length=8) --> <!-- <P15472></P15472> --> <!-- Length(m) to Keep Door 2 Open (Integer value: 5 - 480) --> <!-- <P15456>5</P15456> --> <!-- Schedule Start Time(Digital string) --> <!-- <P15457>20180516000000</P15457> --> <!-- Schedule End Time (Digital string) --> <!-- <P15458>20180516000000</P15458> --> <!-- Schedule Table (Format:door_sch,0@start_time@end_time. Example:door_sch,0@0000@2359) --> <!-- <P15459>0</P15459> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Door System Settings - Group ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Group string. (Format:index@scheduleX@name. Example:1@1@info,2@1@test) --> <!-- <P15300></P15300> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Door System Settings - Schedule ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15200>schedule1@0,0@0000@0000,</P15200> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15201>schedule2@0,0@0000@0000,</P15201> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15202>schedule3@0,0@0000@0000,</P15202> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15203>schedule4@0,0@0000@0000,</P15203> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15204>schedule5@0,0@0000@0000,</P15204> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15205>schedule6@0,0@0000@0000,</P15205> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15206>schedule7@0,0@0000@0000,</P15206> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15207>schedule8@0,0@0000@0000,</P15207> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15208>schedule9@0,0@0000@0000,</P15208> --> <!-- Schedule String. Format: name@holiday_mode,weekday@start_time@end_time,weekday@start_time@end_time, --> <!-- <P15209>schedule10@0,0@0000@0000,</P15209> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Door System Settings - Holiday ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15250>holiday1,</P15250> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15251>holiday2,</P15251> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15252>holiday3,</P15252> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15253>holiday4,</P15253> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15254>holiday5,</P15254> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15255>holiday6,</P15255> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15256>holiday7,</P15256> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15257>holiday8,</P15257> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15258>holiday9,</P15258> --> <!-- Holiday string. Format: name,start_date@end_date, Example: hahaha,20170708@20170910, --> <!-- <P15259>holiday10,</P15259> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## System Settings - Date & Time ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Allow DHCP Option 42 to override NTP server (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P144>0</P144> <!-- Time Zone --> <P64>%%param::time_timezone_grandstreamexec%%</P64> <!-- Enable Daylight Saving Time (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P10004>1</P10004> --> <!-- DST --> <!-- <P10005></P10005> --> <!-- Enable NTP (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P5006>1</P5006> <!-- NTP Server (type:string maxlength:255) --> <P30>%%param::time_ntp_server%%</P30> <!-- Update Interval(m) (value:60~1440) --> <P10006>1440</P10006>
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## System Settings - Network Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- IP Address Mode (0:DHCP 1:Static IP) --> <!-- <P8>0</P8> --> <!-- IP Address segment1 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P9>192</P9> --> <!-- IP Address segment2 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P10>168</P10> --> <!-- IP Address segment3 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P11>40</P11> --> <!-- IP Address segment4 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P12>130</P12> --> <!-- Subnet Mask segment1 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P13>255</P13> --> <!-- Subnet Mask segment2 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P14>255</P14> --> <!-- Subnet Mask segment3 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P15>254</P15> --> <!-- Subnet Mask segment4 (value: 0~255, if segment1,segment2,segment3 equal 255,then segment4 limited 0 - 240) --> <!-- <P16>0</P16> --> <!-- Gateway segment1 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P17>192</P17> --> <!-- Gateway segment2 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P18>168</P18> --> <!-- Gateway segment3 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P19>40</P19> --> <!-- Gateway segment4 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P20>5</P20> -->
<!-- DNS Address Type (0:Dynamic 1:Static DNS) --> <!-- <P10107>0</P10107> --> <!-- DNS Server 1 segment1 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P21>192</P21> --> <!-- DNS Server 1 segment2 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P22>168</P22> --> <!-- DNS Server 1 segment3 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P23>40</P23> --> <!-- DNS Server 1 segment4 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P24>58</P24> --> <!-- DNS Server 2 segment1 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P25>8</P25> --> <!-- DNS Server 2 segment2 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P26>8</P26> --> <!-- DNS Server 2 segment3 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P27>8</P27> --> <!-- DNS Server 2 segment4 (value: 0~255) --> <!-- <P28>8</P28> -->
<!-- LLDP Enable(0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P1684>%%lldpenabled%%</P1684> -->
<!-- Enable DHCP VLAN. 0 - Disable, 1 - Enable. Default is 0. --> <P8300>%%vlanwanenabled%%</P8300>
<!-- Layer 2 QoS 802.1Q/VLAN Tag(0-255) --> <P51>%%vlanwanportid%%</P51> -->
<!-- Layer 2 QoS 802.1p Priority Value for SIP signaling(0-7) --> <P87>%%vlanwanportpriority%%</P87> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## System Settings - Access Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Web Connection Mode (0:HTTP 1:HTTPS) --> <!-- <P12054>1</P12054> --> <!-- Web Access Port (value: HTTP 80~65535 HTTPS 443-65535) --> <!-- <P901>443</P901> --> <!-- RTSP Port (value: 554 - 65535) --> <!-- <P903>10810</P903> --> <!-- User Login Timeout(min) (value: 3~60) --> <!-- <P12056>5</P12056> --> <!-- Max Times Consecutively Login Error (value: 3~10) --> <!-- <P14832>5</P14832> --> <!-- Login Error Lock Time (value: 5~60) --> <!-- <P14834>5</P14834> --> <!-- Disable Web Access (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15473>0</P15473> --> <!-- Enable UPnP Discovery (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P12053>1</P12053> --> <!-- Enable Anonymous LiveView (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P15469>0</P15469> --> <!-- Enable SSH (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P276>1</P276> --> <!-- SSH Port(value: 22 or 444-65535, default 22) --> <!-- <P27006>22</P27006> --> <!-- GDSManager Configuration Password (value: String & MAX length is 32) --> <!-- <P15505></P15505> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## System Settings - User Management ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Admin Password (Type: string, Max length is 32) --> <P2>%%DESKPHONE_PASSWORD%%</P2>
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Account - SIP Basic Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Account Active (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P271>1</P271>
<!-- Account Name (type:string maxlength=64) --> <P3>%%extension_first_name%% %%extension_last_name%%</P3>
{IF network=LOCALLAN} <!-- SIP Server Local configuration - Local internal IP Address of the server --> <P47>%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</P47> <!-- Outbound Proxy - The "P48" field contains the ip address and SIP port of the SIP Outbound Proxy - in this case 3CXPS. The "pbx_ip" and "param::sipport" variables will be replaced by the IP Address and SIP Port of 3CXPS. --> <P48></P48> <!-- Local SIP port (default 5060) --> <P40>5060</P40> <!-- NAT Traversal. 0 - no, 1 - STUN, 2 - keep alive, 3 - UPnP, 4 - Auto, 5 - VPN --> <P52>0</P52> {ENDIF}
{IF network=REMOTESTUN} <!-- SIP Server configuration for remote using stun mode - External IP Address --> <P47>%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</P47> <!-- Outbound Proxy - The "P48" field contains the ip address and SIP port of the SIP Outbound Proxy - in this case 3CXPS. The "pbx_ip" and "param::sipport" variables will be replaced by the IP Address and SIP Port of 3CXPS. --> <P48></P48> <!-- Local SIP port (default 5060) --> <P40>%%phonesipport%%</P40> <!-- NAT Traversal. 0 - no, 1 - STUN, 2 - keep alive, 3 - UPnP, 4 - Auto, 5 - VPN --> <P52>1</P52> {ENDIF}
{IF network=SBC} <!-- SIP Server configuration for SBC Profile --> <P47>%%param::PBXPUBLICIP%%:%%param::sipport%%</P47> <!-- Outbound Proxy - The "P48" field contains the ip address and SIP port of the SIP Outbound Proxy - in this case 3CXPS. The "pbx_ip" and "param::sipport" variables will be replaced by the IP Address and SIP Port of 3CXPS. --> <P48>%%local_sbc_ip%%:%%local_sbc_port%%</P48> <!-- Local SIP port (default 5060) --> <!--P40 = 5060 --> <!-- NAT Traversal. 0 - no, 1 - STUN, 2 - keep alive, 3 - UPnP, 4 - Auto, 5 - VPN --> <P52>0</P52> {ENDIF}
<!-- SIP User ID --> <!-- String --> <P35>%%extension_number%%</P35>
<!-- Authenticate ID --> <!-- String --> <P36>%%extension_auth_id%%</P36>
<!-- Authenticate Password --> <!-- String --> <P34>%%extension_auth_pw%%</P34>
<!-- TEL URI (0:Disabled 1:User=phone 2:Enabled) --> <P63>0</P63>
<!-- Register Expiration(m) (value:60~64800 default:3600) --> <P32>2</P32> <!-- Re-register Expiration(s) (value:1 - 64800 default:0) --> <P2330>0</P2330> <!-- SIP Transport (0:UDP 1:TCP 2:TLS/TCP) --> <!-- <P130>0</P130> --> <!-- Stream (0: Stream 1 1: Stream 2 2: Stream 3) --> <P15480>0</P15480> <!-- Enable DTMF RFC2833 (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P2302>1</P2302> <!-- Enable DTMF SIP INFO (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P2303>0</P2303> <!-- DTMF Payload Type (value: 96 - 127 default 101) --> <P79>101</P79>
<!-- Unregister On Reboot (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P81>1</P81> --> <!-- Enable SRTP (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P183>0</P183> --> <!-- Special Feature (100:Standard 102:Broadsoft) --> <!-- <P100>100</P100> --> <!-- Enable RTCP (0: Disable 1: RTCP 2: RTCP-XR) --> <!-- <P293>0</P293> --> <!-- H.264 Payload Type (value: 96 - 127 and no include 101) --> <!-- <P424>101</P424> --> <!-- # Add MAC in User-Agent --> <!-- # 0 - No, 1 - Yes except REGISTER, 2 - Yes to all SIP. Default is 0 --> <!-- # Number: 0, 1, 2 --> <P26061>2</P26061>
<!-- # 0 - PCMU, 2 - G.726-32, 8 - PCMA, 9 - G.722, 18 - G.729A/B, 4 - G.723.1, 98 - iLBC, 125 - OPUS --> <!-- # choice 1. Default is 0 --> <!-- # Number: 0, 2, 4, 8, 9, 18, 98, 125 --> <!-- # Mandatory --> <P57>%%codec1%%</P57>
<!-- # choice 2. Default is 8 --> <!-- # Number: 0, 2, 4, 8, 9, 18, 98, 125 --> <!-- # Mandatory --> <P58>%%codec2%%</P58>
<!-- # choice 3. Default is 4 --> <!-- # Number: 0, 2, 4, 8, 9, 18, 98, 125 --> <!-- # Mandatory --> <P59>%%codec3%%</P59>
<!-- # choice 4. Default is 18 --> <!-- # Number: 0, 2, 4, 8, 9, 18, 98, 125 --> <!-- # Mandatory --> <P60>%%codec4%%</P60>
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Phone Settings - Phone Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## --> {IF network=REMOTESTUN} <!-- Local RTP port. Default is 5004 --> <!-- Number: 1024 - 65535. Must be even number --> <!-- Mandatory --> <P39>%%rtp_port_min%%</P39> <!-- STUN server --> <!-- String --> <P76>%%pbx_ip%%:%%param::sipport%%</P76> {ENDIF}
{IF network=SBC} <!-- Local RTP port (1024-65535, default 5004) --> <P39>5004</P39> <!-- STUN server --> <!-- <P76></P76> --> {ENDIF}
{IF network=LOCALLAN} <!-- Local RTP port (1024-65535, default 5004) --> <P39>5004</P39> <!-- STUN server --> <!-- <P76></P76> --> {ENDIF}
<!-- User Random Port (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P78>0</P78> <!-- Auto On-Hook Timer(s) (value: 0~65535) --> <P10451>300</P10451> <!-- Ring Timeout(s) (value: 0~90) --> <P14847>30</P14847> <!-- SIP TLS Certificate (String & MAX length is 4096) --> <!-- <P280></P280> --> <!-- SIP TLS Private Key (String & MAX length is 4096) --> <!-- <P279></P279> --> <!-- SIP TLS Private Key Password (String & MAX length is 4096) --> <!-- <P281></P281> -->
<!-- Enable Direct IP Call (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <P10453>1</P10453> <!-- Enable two-way SIP Calling (0:Enable 1:Disable) --> <P8001>0</P8001> <!-- Allow Reset Via SIP NOTIFY (0:Enable 1:Disable) --> <P15476>0</P15476>
{IF ua=GDS3710} <!-- SIP Proxy Compatibility Mode (0:Enable 1:Disable) --> <P8003>1</P8003> <!-- SIP Packetization Compatibility Mode (0:Enable 1:Disable) --> <P957>1</P957> <!-- Enable Multi-channel Call Mode (0:Enable 1:Disable) --> <P15427>1</P15427> {ENDIF}
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Phone Settings - White List ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Account 1 White List --> <!-- Enable White Number List (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P10410>0</P10410> --> <!-- Phone Number (Format:123,4567,) --> <!-- <P10410></P10410> -->
<!-- Account 2 White List --> <!-- Enable White Number List (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P10454>0</P10454> --> <!-- Phone Number (Format:123,4567,) --> <!-- <P10460></P10460> -->
<!-- Account 3 White List --> <!-- Enable White Number List (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P10420>0</P10420> --> <!-- Phone Number (Format:123,4567,) --> <!-- <P10421></P10421> -->
<!-- Account 4 White List --> <!-- Enable White Number List (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P10430>0</P10430> --> <!-- Phone Numbert (Format:123,4567,) --> <!-- <P10431></P10431> -->
{IF ua=GDS3710} <!--################################################################## --> <!--## Video & Audio Settings - Video Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Stream 1 Preferred Video Codec (96:H264 26:MJPEG) --> <!-- <P12306>96</P12306> --> <!-- Stream 1 Profile (0:Baseline 1:Main Profile 2:Hight Profile) --> <!-- <P12313>1</P12313> --> <!-- Stream 1 Resolution (1025:1920*1080 1022:1280*720) --> <!-- <P12307>1025</P12307> --> <!-- Stream 1 Bit Rate(kbps) (1024/2048/4096) --> <!-- <P12315>4096</P12315> --> <!-- Stream 1 Frame Rate(fps) (5/10/15(If CMOS is Low Hight). 5/10/15/20/25/30(Others)) --> <!-- <P12904>30</P12904> --> <!-- Stream 1 Bit Rate Control (0:CBR 1:VBR) --> <!-- <P12924>0</P12924> --> <!-- Stream 1 Image Quality --> <!-- <P12311></P12311> --> <!-- Stream 1 I-frame Interval (Integer 1 - 100) --> <!-- <P12312>1</P12312> -->
<!-- Stream 2 Preferred Video Codec (96:H264 26:MJPEG) --> <!-- <P12706>96</P12706> --> <!-- Stream 2 Profile (0:Baseline 1:Main Profile 2:Hight Profile) --> <!-- <P12713>1</P12713> --> <!-- Stream 2 Resolution (1025:1920*1080 1022:1280*720) --> <!-- <P12707>1025</P12707> --> <!-- Stream 2 Bit Rate(kbps) (1024/2048/4096) --> <!-- <P12708>4096</P12708> --> <!-- Stream 2 Frame Rate(fps) (5/10/15(If CMOS is Low Hight). 5/10/15/20/25/30(Others)) --> <!-- <P12709>30</P12709> --> <!-- Stream 2 Bit Rate Control (0:CBR 1:VBR) --> <!-- <P12710>0</P12710> --> <!-- Stream 2 Image Quality --> <!-- <P12711></P12711> --> <!-- Stream 2 I-frame Interval (Integer 1 - 100) --> <!-- <P12712>1</P12712> -->
<!-- Stream 3 Preferred Video Codec (96:H264 26:MJPEG) --> <!-- <P13106>96</P13106> --> <!-- Stream 3 Profile (0:Baseline 1:Main Profile 2:Hight Profile) --> <!-- <P13113>1</P13113> --> <!-- Stream 3 Resolution (1025:1920*1080 1022:1280*720) --> <!-- <P13107>1025</P13107> --> <!-- Stream 3 Bit Rate(kbps) (1024/2048/4096) --> <!-- <P13108>4096</P13108> --> <!-- Stream 3 Frame Rate(fps) (5/10/15(If CMOS is Low Hight). 5/10/15/20/25/30(Others)) --> <!-- <P13109>30</P13109> --> <!-- Stream 3 Bit Rate Control (0:CBR 1:VBR) --> <!-- <P13110>0</P13110> --> <!-- Stream 3 Image Quality --> <!-- <P13111></P13111> --> <!-- Stream 3 I-frame Interval (Integer 1 - 100) --> <!-- <P13112>1</P13112> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Video & Audio Settings - OSD Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- Enable Display Time (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P10044>1</P10044> --> <!-- Enable Display Text (0:Disable 1:Enable) --> <!-- <P10045>0</P10045> --> <!-- OSD Date Format (0:YYY-MM-DD 1:MM/DD/YYYY 2:DD MM YYYY) --> <!-- <P10001>1</P10001> --> <!-- OSD Time Format (0:24H 1:12H) --> <!-- <P10007>0</P10007> --> <!-- OSD Text (String & Max length is 32) --> <!-- <P10040></P10040> --> <!-- OSD Date/Time Position (0:Top Left 1:Bottom Left 2:Top Right 3:Bottom Right) --> <!-- <P10041>0</P10041> --> <!-- OSD Text Position (0:Top Left 1:Bottom Left 2:Top Right 3:Bottom Right) --> <!-- <P10046>0</P10046> -->
<!--################################################################## --> <!--## Video & Audio Settings - CMOS Settings ## --> <!--################################################################## --> <!-- CMOS Mode (1:Normal 2:Low Light 3:WDR) --> <!-- <P10572>1</P10572> --> <!-- CMOS LDC (0:OFF 1:ON) --> <!-- <P10573>0</P10573> --> <!-- CMOS LDC Rate(7: 0.7, 8: 0.8, 9: 0.9, 10: 1.0, 11: 1.1, 12: 1.2, 13: 1.3) --> <!-- <P14565>10</P14565> --> <!-- CMOS Power Frequency (0:50HZ 1:60HZ) --> <!-- <P12314>1</P12314> --> <!-- CMOS Shutter Speed (0:auto 30:1/30 60:1/60 125:1/125 250:1/250 500:1/500 1000:1/1000 2000:1/2000 5000:1/5000 10000:1/10000) --> <!-- <P10503>0</P10503> --> {ENDIF}

(value:1-10) --> <!-- <P14826>1</P14826> --> <!-- Enable Non-scheduled Access Alarm (0:Disable 1:Enable default:1) --> <!-- <P15407>1</P15407> --> <!-- Non-scheduled Access Alarm profile.
